articles.author: 吴说区块链
articles.description:
MetaMask 表示，如果您是 MetaMask 用户：请确保在 MetaMask 扩展中开启了 Blockaid 功能，然后再在 MetaMask Portfolio 上进行任何交易。MetaMask Portfolio 团队正在处理此事，并且已经准备了一个解决方案，该方案将于今天推出。

吴说区块链: 吴说获悉，SushiSwap CTO Matthew Lilley 发推称，在进一步通知之前，请不要与任何去中心化应用（dApps）进行互动。看起来一个常用的 web3 连接器已经被破坏，导致恶意代码的注入，影响了众多的去中心化应用。随后，他又在评论中表示 Ledger 可能存在可疑代码。https://www.wublock123.com/index.php?m=content&c=index&a=show&catid=46&id=21653

articles.author: DeFi Educator
articles.description:
RT Mudit Gupta
The ledger issue is now fixed.
To make sure you don't have the malicious library cached, go to https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@ledgerhq/connect-kit@1 and ensure the version is 1.1.8.
If it's not, clear your cache. chrome- F12> Chrome Developer Tools > Application tab > Storage in left tree> Clear site data.

articles.author: DeFi Educator
articles.description:
RT REKTBuildr 🔺🔺🔺
Basically every single file on Ledger Live has user trackers in them
I've cleaned a bunch and there's still 310 files
Ledger REALLY wants to know what you're doing on Ledger Live. Every click, every keystroke, every thing you look at gets tracked, logged and phoned home to… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1732542258698694875


REKTBuildr 🔺🔺🔺: Cleaning user tracking code from Ledger Live code and JFC the whole thing is a gigantic user tracking system
There's analytics trackers for nearly all events, on most screens. 
Ledger Live is a user data collection tool
How is this system even accepted by the crypto community?

articles.description:

https://x.com/defi_educator/status/1731330907217248395?s=46&t=cM-600GJga7XNxddNsm-Pw

DeFi Educator: 1) BTC pumps >$40k
2) Sidelineoors now need to bet more to make it 
3) traders who caught the pump take profit and roll them over into the altcoin casino
4) Money flows from BTC -> Alts = altseason 
5) BTC+ETH dominance chart makes a lower low
